description: Red Points offers clients a platform to protect their brands online through solutions that fight counterfeits, piracy, impersonation, and distribution abuse.

Referencia is a by now pay later fintech that works hand in hand with retailers to give customers the opportunity to purchase with installment loans at the point of sale. Loans are 100% real-time and digitally approved.
Refinancia developed a unique approach to Colombia’s Non-Performing Loan (NPL) market, giving those who are swimming in debt a fresh chance at success.

RemotePass is a global payroll & compliance platform for remote teams. Using its contract management system, companies can instantly create localized & compliant contracts in 100+ countries, onboard remote team members and process mass cross-border payroll.
Rented provides technology, tools and services to help vacation rental professionals optimize their portfolio of properties.
Reservamos is a multi-model online booking engine that caters to bus passengers and operators in the Americas.
Restorando.com is an online restaurant reservations company that operates in Brazil and Argentina. It was acquired by TripAdvisor-owned restaurant reservation platform TheFork in 2019.
PricingCompass helps retailers and brands make faster and smarter pricing decisions by providing them with transparent reports on competitors’ pricing, product mix, and product availability.
Retail Engage is an award-winning customer engagement and incentives solutions business helping clients to drive customer acquisition and retention.
Right Bite delivers freshly prepared, personalized, healthy meals to its customers, helping them achieve and maintain their long-term wellness goals and create sustainable healthy lifestyles.

Ripio is democratizing access to crypto products in Latin America with a suite of blockchain based products that includes a wallet, an exchange, payments, lending, cash-in/out system, API services, and an OTC Trading desk.

Rivera Group delivers innovative IT services and market disruptive software. Its work spans DoD and civilian agencies, where the company specializes in value-added, cost-effective enterprise cyber defense solutions.
RMES Analytics provides asset performance management (APM) software for asset-heavy industries, such as mining and energy.
RMES Analytics provides asset performance management (APM) software for asset-heavy industries, such as mining and energy.

RoadSync is the digital financial platform for the logistics industry. By removing paper and phone calls from business transactions, RoadSync offers a fast, convenient and secure way to move and manage money and conduct business.

Roboze manufactures 3D printers that process super-polymers and composite materials to create finished functional parts that can be used in the most extreme conditions and sectors, while optimizing costs and time along the entire supply chain.
Robtec provides customized 3D printing solutions and services for the automobile and aeronautical industries, among others. Robtec was acquired in 2014 by 3D Systems.
Rock Content creates products and services that empower brands to launch high-quality content strategies that build awareness and drive revenue.

Rocket.Chat is the complete communication solution, simplifying complex integrations with the unique open source flexibility that empowers organizations to extend their platforms beyond proprietary solutions, improve cost efficiency, and increase ownership of their data.
Rotamundos is the first online hotel and local experiences chain providing culture, nature and global adventure.
